page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: THE AREA OF THIS BLOCK COVERS THE COUNTRY SIDE SOUTH OF EXETER.THE AREA IS BEST VIEWED FROM THE TOP OF THE NEARBY HALDON HILLS.GREAT HALDON RISES TO 233 METERS ABOVE SEA LEVEL . THE REGION IS GIVEN OVER TO MIXED AGRICULTURE WITH MANY SMALL FARMS COVERING THE UNDULATING COUNTRYSIDE.DIVIDING THE AREA ON A LINE NORTH SOUTH IS A MAJOR HIGHWAY .THIS DUALCARRIAGE WAY ,THE A38 RUNS SOUTH TO CORNWALL AND NORTH TO JOIN THE M5 MOTORWAY WHICH LEADS TO LONDON AND THE NORTH. BRANCHING FROM THE A38 IS THE A380 ,A MAIN ROAD WHICH TAKES TRAFFIC TO THE TOURIST RESORTS OF TORBAY.THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE IS COVERED WITH NARROW LANES LINKING VILLAGES TOGETHER AND GIVING A QUIETER ROUTE FOR THE MOTORIST.
